short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See at a glance which users thumbs up the merge requests. Quickly access the ticket linked to this merge request via a new button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you use Gitlab in large team, you might need this extension.

- adds a button linked to your ticketing system (eg. Jira)
- highlights merge requests that are ready to be merged
- shows a tooltip of who approved the merge request and general state of the merge request
- highlights desired authors (teammates)
